title: White 100% Cotton Infant Baby Boy's Christening Baptism Knit Romper w/Cross
features: Baby Boy Super Soft Short-Sleeve Romper
Detail: Subtle Cross hand-embroidered with white gloss yarn on the bodice and 6 stitched pleats along chest
Closure/Edging: Smooth button closures between legs and on back. Ribbed sleeve edge with double knit leg edge.
Occasion: Christening, Baptism, Blessing, or Sunday Dress
description: This Baby Boy Super Soft 100% Cotton Longall has a raised border panel design across chest w/ 3 buttons. Small knit collar. Smooth button closures between legs and on back. Short-sleeved longall with ribbed edges on sleeves and pant leg. A perfect soft short-sleeved, long pant longall knit for Christening, Baptism, Blessing, or Sunday Dress. Available NB-12 Months. Handwash. Dry Flat.
